extendedInfo.description: Your Christmas List or Santa's ListFeatures include:-Gift Tracking by Person-Gift Cost Tracking-Cost Summary-Password protectionNew: Faster and Better User Interface

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: So convenient and easy to use. Love the animation, makes spending even more enjoyable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keep track of gifts!
reviews.comment: This app is great to keep track of gifts.  I try to keep gift limits equal among my kids,nieces and nephews.  This app keeps track of how much I spend on each person.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant! It\'s easy and quick to use and nice pictures. Great that the list can be emailed. Only wish the birthday app was this good too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but could improve
reviews.comment: 1. Allow user to choose icon. 2. Use whole dollars or two decimal places, not one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this! So easy, worth the $2 for the password protection from nosey kids! Great to keep track of stores in the notes and spending.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used last Christmas
reviews.comment: Would be GREAT if it had the option to add another year so I can keep last years list. Or an option to delete all gifts so I can start 2011 shopping.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Generic
reviews.comment: app is ok if you want something basic, I do like the option where you input people\'s sizes of clothes, wish it had different icons & barcode scanner
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: EXCELLENT APP.. I LOVE IT..I don\'t forget my lists now cos its always with me..I even marked the presents off as I wrapped them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seemed great at first but doesnt always stay locked so i cant trust it. Limited. Why give icons if we cant change them or rearrange the order.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best gift tracker I\'ve seen so far.
reviews.comment: Cute graphics & easy to use. Awesome password feature too. You should make one for multiple gift-giving holidays (birthdays, anniversaries etc...) Would pay $ for an all-in-one app that you could assign the cute pictures to for but different occasions. An option to take a picture of the gifts would also be a plus. Please fix so that you don\'t lose the data you are entering when your device accidently turns on its side.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and useful
reviews.comment: Good list but obviously made for mobiles. Got it installed on my Tablet. The ability to reduce text size to fit more on screen, ability to change icons for each person and a slightly better quality of image for the larger screen would finish this app off perfectly!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would like the app to use the full screen on my Evo 3D. Other than that, great app! I used this last year and was a life saver.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: Was very useful last year, but now crashing on my S3 a few moments after opening and has annoying deleted all data from last Christmas. Too late for the data, but pls fix crashes!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good and simple
reviews.comment: Love it. Only wish they had one added thing. Like a check mark by your gift for wrapping the gifts you buy. It may sound silly, but I am a list person. It helps me to make sure all my gifts are ready for Santa.
reviews.author: geraldine becher

reviews.comment: Love this app! Has kept me so organized. You can see exactly how much you\'ve spent on each person as well as total amount. Works great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: XMAS LIST
reviews.comment: I JUST LOVE IT,I MADE A FAKE LIST AND LEFT IT WHERE MY KIDS AND GRANDKIDS CAN FINE IT I AM HAVING FUN.THANK-YOU EVER SO MUCH.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app! I\'ve been using it for weeks to keep track of numerous gifts for ten people. Worth buying. Will use again next year. Super cute too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute but still not ready for Christmas
reviews.comment: I tried this app last year (2011) I really thought they would improve it but no go, still!  With all the 7 to 10 inch tablets you think they would format this to fit those screens by now. Cute interface but lacks the basic things needed to make list for people\'s gifts. It\'s nice to store someone\'s pant\'s size but maybe so area\'s to put the store\'s you would like to purchase it\'s at, how much you found them for etc. All this has to be put in this notes area which is stupid.  It has a lot of potential but once again it fails to come through as a good useful app. There are plenty of ones out there that are much better.  Developers either fix this or remove it because I have waited for a year and nothing....again.
reviews.author: John HM Kruse

reviews.title: If only....
reviews.comment: I was very excited about this app. It\'s useful and fun looking. But I\'m utterly disenchanted that I can\'t sync what I entered on my tablet to my phone. I wrote the developers and asked if there was a way to do it and did not even get the courtesy of a reply.
reviews.author: Annette Dimond

reviews.comment: App wants you to sign a disclaimer, allowing advertisers to spam you, with cookies...\nUninstalled...
reviews.author: A Google User
